Headline: #22 Clark, #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop
ShortDescription: NB 22 Clark, 151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark, #151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at 135th/Avenue O
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are rerouted via Avenue O, 133rd, Baltimore, then resume over their normal route, due to street blockage near 135th/Avenue O.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Avenue O, 133rd, Baltimore, then resume over their normal route, due to street blockage near 135th/Avenue O.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing Morse Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Morse due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Morse due to police activity.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #36 Broadway and #151 Sheridan buses.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
